languages.text: "Я... не обладаю достаточным познанием о структурных особенностях Черных кораблей, {name}. Тем не менее, я узнаю некоторые устройства, обломки которых скрыты под порождениями Архиврага. Остатки пси-щитов... динамики для оглушения заключенных... распылители седативов..."

"I... have insufficient knowledge of the structural features of Black Ships, {name}. However, I do recognise some of the fragments of the devices littered beneath the Archenemy's spawn. Remnants of psy-shields... speakers for stunning prisoners... sedative diffusers..."
languages.original_text: "Я... не обладаю достаточным познанием о структурных особенностях Черных кораблей, {name}. Тем не менее, я узнаю некоторые устройства, обломки которых скрыты под порождениями Архиврага. Остатки пси-щитов... динамики для оглушения заключенных... распылители седативов..."

traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I... have insufficient knowledge of the structural features of Black Ships, {name}. However, I do recognise some of the fragments of the devices littered beneath the Archenemy's spawn. Remnants of psy-shields... speakers for stunning prisoners... sedative diffusers..."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «No... tengo los suficientes conocimientos sobre los rasgos estructurales de las naves negras, {name}. Sin embargo, reconozco algunos fragmentos de los dispositivos que hay bajo los engendros del Archienemigo. Restos de escudos psíquicos... altavoces para aturdir prisioneros... aspersores de sedantes...».
languages.original_text: "I... have insufficient knowledge of the structural features of Black Ships, {name}. However, I do recognise some of the fragments of the devices littered beneath the Archenemy's spawn. Remnants of psy-shields... speakers for stunning prisoners... sedative diffusers..."

traits.locale_text: «No... tengo los suficientes conocimientos sobre los rasgos estructurales de las naves negras, {name}. Sin embargo, reconozco algunos fragmentos de los dispositivos que hay bajo los engendros del Archienemigo. Restos de escudos psíquicos... altavoces para aturdir prisioneros... aspersores de sedantes...».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「俺は…〈黒き御船〉の構造についてはよくわからない、{name}。だが、渾沌の勢力の化け物の下に散らばっている装置の破片の一部に見覚えがある。精神シールドの残骸…囚人を気絶させるためのスピーカー…鎮静剤の拡散機…」
languages.original_text: "I... have insufficient knowledge of the structural features of Black Ships, {name}. However, I do recognise some of the fragments of the devices littered beneath the Archenemy's spawn. Remnants of psy-shields... speakers for stunning prisoners... sedative diffusers..."

traits.locale_text: 「俺は…〈黒き御船〉の構造についてはよくわからない、{name}。だが、渾沌の勢力の化け物の下に散らばっている装置の破片の一部に見覚えがある。精神シールドの残骸…囚人を気絶させるためのスピーカー…鎮静剤の拡散機…」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “我……对黑船的整体结构特征不太了解，{name}。不过，我确实认出了混沌大敌的孽种留下的某种设备残骸。灵能护盾的碎片……用来制服囚犯的扬声器……镇定剂扩散器……”
languages.original_text: "I... have insufficient knowledge of the structural features of Black Ships, {name}. However, I do recognise some of the fragments of the devices littered beneath the Archenemy's spawn. Remnants of psy-shields... speakers for stunning prisoners... sedative diffusers..."

traits.locale_text: “我……对黑船的整体结构特征不太了解，{name}。不过，我确实认出了混沌大敌的孽种留下的某种设备残骸。灵能护盾的碎片……用来制服囚犯的扬声器……镇定剂扩散器……”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Je ne connais pas suffisamment les caractéristiques structurelles des Vaisseaux Noirs, {name}. Je reconnais toutefois certains des débris éparpillés sous le serviteur du Grand Ennemi. Des boucliers psychiques... des haut-parleurs servant à étourdir les prisonniers... des diffuseurs de sédatifs... »
languages.original_text: "I... have insufficient knowledge of the structural features of Black Ships, {name}. However, I do recognise some of the fragments of the devices littered beneath the Archenemy's spawn. Remnants of psy-shields... speakers for stunning prisoners... sedative diffusers..."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne connais pas suffisamment les caractéristiques structurelles des Vaisseaux Noirs, {name}. Je reconnais toutefois certains des débris éparpillés sous le serviteur du Grand Ennemi. Des boucliers psychiques... des haut-parleurs servant à étourdir les prisonniers... des diffuseurs de sédatifs... »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Ich ... weiß nicht genug über die strukturellen Eigenschaften von Schwarzen Schiffen, {name}. Ich erkenne jedoch einige der Fragmente der Geräte, die unter der Brut des Erzfeindes verteilt sind. Überreste von Psi-Schilden ... Lautsprecher, um Gefangene zu betäuben ... sedative Diffuser ..."
languages.original_text: "I... have insufficient knowledge of the structural features of Black Ships, {name}. However, I do recognise some of the fragments of the devices littered beneath the Archenemy's spawn. Remnants of psy-shields... speakers for stunning prisoners... sedative diffusers..."

traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Benim... Kara Gemilerin yapısal özelliklerine dair irfanım sınırlı {name}. Ancak Şerbaşı'nın bu tohumunun altında yatan, dökülüp saçılmış bazı cihaz parçalarını tanıyorum. Ruhsezi kalkanı kalıntıları... Mahkûmları sersemletmek için hoparlörler... Yatıştırıcı difüzörler..."
languages.original_text: "I... have insufficient knowledge of the structural features of Black Ships, {name}. However, I do recognise some of the fragments of the devices littered beneath the Archenemy's spawn. Remnants of psy-shields... speakers for stunning prisoners... sedative diffusers..."
